author: bridge-bot
content:
<e_nyc> Hey all

If there any folks unable to be in Istanbul for Devconnect, and happen to be in the NYC area(or nearby), here's a Devconnect satellite event for you: https://lu.ma/DCxNYC

Would be awesome to have folks talk about RIPs, EOFs, and more. (Ping me if interested in speaking/presenting)

Cheers!
